title: How to turn images into links
content:
[ link=[url=http://www.whatever.xxx/]www.whatever.xxx/[/url]][ img noborder][url=http://www.whatever.xxx/someimage.yyy[/]www.whatever.xxx/someimage.yyy[/[/url] img][/ link] (just remember to remove the excess spaces) (also, replace the xxx with either net, com, org, gov, etc., and replace the yyy with bmp, gif, etc..)

Example:[ link=[url=http://pub128.ezboard.com/bpubliccommanderkeenforum]pub128.ezboard.com/bpubli...rkeenforum[/url]][ img noborder][url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/pckf_banner.jpg[/]www.classicgaming.com/cc3...nner.jpg[/[/url] img][/ link]=[url=http://pub128.ezboard.com/bpubliccommanderkeenforum][img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/pckf_banner.jpg[/img][/url] (edit: fixed a web address mistake)A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
Down with VGA! Up with EGA!
